Description.Name: Improved Swarm LRM Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Improved Swarm missiles that mimic the splash damage capability of artillery shells with greater accuracy and a more damaging effect than Swarm missiles. Swarm-I ammo bins hold the same number of shots per ton as standard LRM ammunition bins.
